password_new_same_as_old: New password must not be the same as the old password
join_success: Successfully joined. Number of slots registered: {slots}

warnings.This is a top-10 common password: This is a top-10 common password.
warnings.This is a top-100 common password: This is a top-100 common password.
warnings.This is a very common password: This is a very common password.
warnings.This is similar to a commonly used passw: This is similar to a commonly used password.
warnings.A word by itself is easy to guess: A word by itself is easy to guess.
warnings.Names and surnames by themselves are eas: Names and surnames by themselves are easy to guess.
warnings.Common names and surnames are easy to gu: Common names and surnames are easy to guess.
warnings.Short keyboard patterns are easy to gues: Short keyboard patterns are easy to guess.
warnings.Repeats like \"aaa\" are easy to guess: Repeats like "aaa" are easy to guess.
warnings.Repeats like \"abcabcabc\" are only slig: Repeats like "abcabcabc" are only slightly harder to guess than "abc".
warnings.Sequences like \"abc\" or \"6543\" are e: Sequences like "abc" or "6543" are easy to guess.
warnings.Recent years are easy to guess: Recent years are easy to guess.
warnings.Dates are often easy to guess: Dates are often easy to guess.
warnings.This password is based on a dictionary w: This password is based on a dictionary word.
warnings.This password can be easily cracked: This password can be easily cracked.
warnings.This password follows a predictable patt: This password follows a predictable pattern.
warnings.This password is not secure enough: This password is not secure enough.

suggestions.Add another word or two. Uncommon words: Add another word or two. Uncommon words are better.
suggestions.Use a longer keyboard pattern with more: Use a longer keyboard pattern with more turns.
suggestions.Avoid years that are associated with you: Avoid using years associated with you (e.g., birth year).
suggestions.Avoid dates and years that are associate: Avoid using dates and years related to you.
suggestions.All-uppercase is almost as easy to guess: All-uppercase is almost as easy to guess as all-lowercase.
suggestions.Reversed words aren't much harder to gue: Reversed words aren't much harder to guess.
suggestions.Substituting symbols for letters (e.g. ': Substituting symbols for letters (e.g., '@' for 'a') doesn't help much.
suggestions.Use a mix of letters, numbers, and symbo: Use a mix of letters, numbers, and symbols.
suggestions.Make your password at least 8 characters: Make your password at least 8 characters long.
suggestions.Use random words that don't relate to yo: Use random words that don't relate to you.
suggestions.Avoid using personal information: Avoid using personal information like names or birthdays.
suggestions.Use unique passwords for each account: Use unique passwords for each account.
suggestions.Make it memorable but not obvious: Make it memorable but not obvious.
suggestions.Use a combination of unrelated words: Use a combination of unrelated words.
suggestions.Add complexity without making it hard to: Add complexity without making it hard to remember.
suggestions.Use a pattern that's not easily guessabl: Use a pattern that's not easily guessable.
suggestions.Make it longer rather than more complex: Make it longer rather than more complex.
suggestions.Use a mix of different character types: Use a mix of different character types.

member_count_exceeds_total_cycles: Member count must not exceed total cycles
group_name_too_long: Group name must not exceed 100 characters
amount_per_cycle_positive: Amount per cycle must be greater than 0
cycle_duration_positive: Cycle duration must be greater than 0
total_cycles_positive: Total cycles must be greater than 0
